title: What context would help Claude here?
detail: Claude knows nothing about your specific situation until you share it. A few sentences of context—what you've tried, why this matters, what constraints you're under—transforms generic advice into targeted help. Context is the difference between useful and useless.
surface_triggers: User asks about something specific to their situation without providing background. User's question assumes knowledge Claude doesn't have. User references something without explaining it. User asks for advice without context.
